title: - new version
message: - new version

title: - updates in build tools
message:
- updates in build tools
- chg: completely new system for line & polygon styling
- chg: created simplified Location constructor to prevent set un-needed tag parameter
- fix: #7 caused by change in MatrixCursor system in latest Locus versions

title: - chg: small performance optimizations
message:
- chg: small performance optimizations
- chg: new track coloring style - slope absolute, not yet fully implemented in Locus Map
- chg: big refractorinjg in ActionTools, mainly added two new methods 'getDataLocusInfo' ( new alternative to old 'getLocusInfo' ) and getDataUpdateContainer which returns UC without need of PeriodicUpdates!
- chg: switched old version of MatrixCursor to new based on Android API 25
- fix: serious problem with obtaining of active Locus version over LocusUtils.getActiveVersion()

title: - chg: updated "PeriodicUpdateReceiver" system in sample application to match latest changes
message:
- chg: updated "PeriodicUpdateReceiver" system in sample application to match latest changes
- chg: update to version 0.2.10 & publish

title: - chg: improvements in API to support explicit intents as well
message: - chg: improvements in API to support explicit intents as well

title: - chg: improved formatting of temperature units
message:
- chg: improved formatting of temperature units
- chg: minor changes in style of track lines
- version 0.2.9

title: - chg: reflect changes in ExtraData and ExtraStyle rename ( main reason because…
message:
- chg: reflect changes in ExtraData and ExtraStyle rename ( main reason because of new ExtraData subclass of SupportActivity.ExtraData)
- chg: major update of all tools related to developing (Android Studio, SDK Tools, DexGuard, few libraries ...)

title: - chg: removed java_home parameters in gradle.properties (users should define…
message: - chg: removed java_home parameters in gradle.properties (users should define own in '~/.gradle/gradle.properties')

message: - minor changes in icons in Sample app and some minor javadoc improvements

title: - added completely new enum PointRteAction that is now used instead of defined…
message: - added completely new enum PointRteAction that is now used instead of defined constants in ExtraData

title: - shortcut to RTE_INDEX parameter in points
message:
- shortcut to RTE_INDEX parameter in points
- LocusInfo object now contains energy, slope and weight units
- other changes mainly in javadoc

title: - limit on Storable container extended to 20 MB
message:
- limit on Storable container extended to 20 MB
- many updates in sample application
- otherwise mainly javadoc & code style changes

title: - united Locus API, Locus API - Android and Locus API - Android (sample) into…
message:
- united Locus API, Locus API - Android and Locus API - Android (sample) into single repository. Both library modules are anyway available separately over maven
- improved sample application to current version of libraries
- some fine-tunning

- fixed set of track statistics
